name: Vector Art 3D Model File
summary: A V3V file contains a 3D model that can be viewed using Vector Art 3D Viewer, a free program for Windows used to view 3D models. It stores a preview of a 3D model that is smaller in size, ranging from 100KB to 1 MB. V3V files may be used for a variety of 3D models, such as animals, symbols, decorative pieces, pictorials, and signs.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
